team.title: CEO and Founder
team.name: George Petre
team.description: 10+ years of experience in Web Development with expertise in SEO, project management and content strategy.

team.title: Web Designer and Co-Founder
team.name: Alexandra Petre
team.description: 7+ years of experience in UI/UX design with expertise in brand identity, visual storytelling, and intuitive design.

process.label: Planning and Research
process.content: Establish clear goals, identify the target audience, and create a comprehensive sitemap and content strategy based on competitor analysis and industry trends.

process.label: Design and UX Creation
process.content: Develop wireframes and prototypes to map user journeys, design visually appealing elements aligned with the brand, and gather user feedback to refine the overall user experience.

process.label: Development
process.content: Choose the appropriate technology stack, implement both frontend and backend development, ensuring a seamless, responsive design that performs well across various devices and browsers.

process.label: Content Creation and Integration
process.content: Develop high-quality, engaging content tailored to your audience, integrate multimedia elements (images, videos, etc.), and ensure that the content is aligned with SEO best practices to enhance visibility and user engagement.

process.label: Launch and Maintenance
process.content: Launch the website, monitor user interactions and performance metrics, provide regular content updates, ensure security, and address bugs promptly to maintain a smooth user experience.

process.label: Marketing and Optimization
process.content: Implement a targeted marketing strategy through SEO, PPC campaigns, and social media outreach, using analytics to continuously optimize the website for better engagement and conversion rates
